longBusinessSummary: K.P.R. Mill Limited operates as an integrated apparel manufacturing company in India and internationally. It operates through three segments: Textile, Sugar, and Others. The company offers compact, combed, carded, melange, polyester cotton, viscose, grindel, red label, colour melange, slub yarn, cotton, poly cotton, melange, BCI, organic, and CMIA REEL yarns; knitted cotton fabrics; and readymade garments comprising casual, sports, active, sleep, and work wear for men, women, and children. It also produces sugar; ethanol; green energy through co-gen power; and wind power; and acts as a dealer for cars. The company offers its products under Faso brand name. K.P.R. Mill Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Coimbatore, India.
